name: Rootin' Up Dirt!
description:
AAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH

(I made this in a weekend for GGJ2023. its unfinished but im not working on it anymore)

How to play: 

Move with WASD

Enter to do things. 

For the plants: 

Each plot is randomly generated of one of three soil types and each plant you plant is random from one of three plants. Each plant has a preferred soil type and to check the health of what you just planted, use your magnifying glass to see how the roots are doing! (There's a glitch in the web version for some reason that each field starts with a plant there??? its weird. But you can still plant stuff)

If the root is red, it's normal and just needs normal water. 

If the root is swollen and blue, it has too much  water! Water it with ginkgo water!

If the root is brittle and dry, it doesnt have enough water! Water it with hydrangea water!

To change your water type, collect ginkgo leaves and hydrangea flowers at the back of the farm and then go to the plant stand in your house. 

Sleep to pass the day and see your plants grow! 

There isn't a win state and nothing happens after the plants reach their final stage. (I ran out of time)
